snippet: After a brawl at the Jets’ training camp Monday, Mark Sanchez said fights between teammates send the wrong message.
abstract: After a brawl at the Jets’ training camp Monday, Mark Sanchez said fights between teammates send the wrong message.

headline.main: Fight at Jets Camp Draws Sanchez's Ire
headline.print_headline: Brawl in Jets’ Camp Leaves Sanchez Perturbed
